page.title: 14SHOPPING SURVEY ,PART 2
page.content:
WE ASKED 33 ROADE FAMILIES HOW OFTEN THEY USE THE VILLAGE SHOPS.
SHOP REGULAR SOMETIME NEVER --------------------------------------- SPAR | 5 | 19 | 9 | COLLEYS | 10 | 10 | 13 | POST OFFICE| 24 | 7 | 2 | TURNER(BUT)| 16 | 4 | 13 | GOODES(BUT)| 2 | 1 | 30 | CHIP SHOP | 2 | 12 | 19 | HEMMINGS | 2 | 2 | 29 | GEAREYS | 5 | 20 | 8 | ALLENS(DIY)| 11 | 18 | 4 | --------------------------------------- SPAR,COLLEYS AND HEMMINGS ARE FOOD SHOPS.GEAREYS SELL WOOL,SHOES AND UNIFORMS (FOR THE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL)
30 FAMILIES GET MILK DELIVERED TO THE HOME BY A MILKMAN.3 USE VILLAGE SHOPS.
